summary:
To whoever that anon was that wrote me wondering if I could ask Niels/David about the boys’ birthdays... 
I sent him screenshots...
body:
To whoever that anon was that wrote me wondering if I could ask Niels/David about the boys’ birthdays…

I sent him screenshots of the anons so he could see that people really were curious because he was like “uh?”… and he saw that you misspelled Niels and wrote Niles and… umm….his reaction had me crying

New digital painting. I have nothing to say about this one a part from the fact that it took me 4 hours and 27 minutes even though the background was done in just 20 minutes.

That been said, as always have a great day!

tags: im sorry i cant help it
summary:
I kept thinking about the number 24 and what the significance of it was supposed to mean. 
In the first two weeks we were given...
body:
I kept thinking about the number 24 and what the significance of it was supposed to mean.

In the first two weeks we were given hints of it being an important number to the story.

First with the vending machine when they first met.

Then with the locker with “Amor Amor” and “insta love” written next to it.

And what was the date this Sunday?? That’s right. March 24th.

And Lucas posted on insta of him and Elliot on the 24th.

I don’t know if this was intended but to me, the 24th represents a new beginning for Lucas and Elliot.

But also the end of our time Lucas, seeing as this is our last week with him.

They gave us a heads up from the very beginnning that the 24th was not only going to be the beginning of something special but also the end.

summary: I still can’t believe I almost missed out on watching this season live. I really wasn’t going to and then people were talking...
body: I still can’t believe I almost missed out on watching this season live. I really wasn’t going to and then people were talking about the ‘call your girlfriend’ clip on my dash and I was like okay fine I’ll go watch. Y’all that was literally one of the best decisions I’ve ever made. Whew.

summary: We wil cry for sure on firday (tbqh i did cry yesterday lmao), but we will make it mecs! And we'll back with our clown make up...
question: We wil cry for sure on firday (tbqh i did cry yesterday lmao), but we will make it mecs! And we'll back with our clown make up the next day. In this fandom we'll never stop clowning ourselves.
answer: This lovely clown fandom is the only thing keeping me going, tbh. Shoutout to all the mecs, I’m making another emotional post about this later 😔💗

summary: i remember that the first thing i saw from skam france s3 was a gif of lucas laughing with imane and i thought: oooooh they are...
body:
i remember that the first thing i saw from skam france s3 was a gif of lucas laughing with imane and i thought: oooooh they are so cute
and then somehow i ended up in this blog seeing their tag for this tv show and of course i noticed it said skam so my mind did something and knew it was a remake of isak’s season. 

and then the piano scene showed up on my tl on twitter… :) and i’m here :) thnks! i’m actually not sure if it appeared out of nowhere or if i was interested about it already. so maybe i searched for it on twitter. thing is, the piano scene did it for me. i cried.. i did. i wanna talk about that moment forever. about this season forever.

tags: it's emo hours up in here
god I will miss this season so much
I can't believe they are leaving us already
summary: I still remember what I felt when I saw the trailer for the first time, I still remember how excited I got when eliott walked...
body:
I still remember what I felt when I saw the trailer for the first time, I still remember how excited I got when eliott walked into the foyer and him and lucas looked at each other for the first time, I still remember the relief I felt when they ran away together and kissed for the first time, I still remember how absolutely speechless I was after seeing samedi 9:17, I still remember all the pain that followed and watching lucas cry for a whole week, I still remember how proud I was when lucas started to open himself up and be proud of who he is, I still remember the built up of emotions I had for their reunion, I still remember how in shock I was after the paint scene, I still remember what I felt during the entirety of episode 8 knowing that it will go from sweet and beautiful to the worst week of lucas’ life, I still remember the tears I shed during vendredi 20:27 2.0 even tho it was barely a week ago, I still remember how proud I was of both eliott and lucas during the clip from this monday.

this season has felt like more than 2 months to me. it was so intense and I got so deeply invested into it I have never experienced it like this before. I don’t think I will forget all these emotions any time soon. if there was a way to start all over again and to relive all of it, even the painful parts, again I would do it. 100%.
